org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.symbols

Interface ITextSymbol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, IPrintable, ISymbol, Persistent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ISimpleTextSymbol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTextSymbol, SmartTextSymbol

    public interface ITextSymbol
extends ISymbol
    ITextSymbol.java
    Represents an ISymbol that draws a text.
